title: thegoatiest
author: thegoatiest
content: Hey.Someone recommended this coin to me. I am sceptical. It has a total supply of 10Billion. Yet only 9% of it is in circulation and its 96% down from its ATH in December 2021.I'm sceptical of any altcoin that got released at the top of the bull run. (They almost all are riding the hype and taking advantage of peoples greed to sell them shitcoins)I'm not really sure what i make of the idea behind the project either. From CoinmarketCap:"Unbound Finance is the first-ever debt-free liquidity provision system. Unbound achieves this by building a derivative layer on top of Automated Market Makers (AMMs) such as Uniswap, Balancer, Mooniswap, Bancor, Curve.fi, etc, unlocking locked liquidity from existing AMM pools and giving loans on existing Liquidity Pool Tokens (LPTs) as collateral.The Unbound Protocol charges no interest and it's liquidation Free."--------It currently has a flexible APR loan rate of 25% at Kucoin. (pretty damn high for a flexible / not staking) Which makes me wonder - why do they want people to buy it? Someone told me it is 100x potential.... but... I don't trust them at all. They pretty much make exclusively bad calls...What're your thoughts on this project? Scam? or does it have potential?Thanks, TG

comments.author: serjent05
comments.created_time: July 16, 2022, 09:05:48 PMLast edit: July 31, 2022, 10:37:56 PM by serjent05
comments.body: Quote from: serjent05 on July 16, 2022, 08:56:28 PMSomeone told me it is 100x potential.... but... I don't trust them at all. They pretty much make exclusively bad calls...If you don't trust them then don't invest.  As simple as that.QuoteWhat're your thoughts on this project? Scam? or does it have potential?It might be not a scam project but look at the current distribution of the token.  If the project failed to gather investors then the only path of the token market is to go down due to the inflation of tokens and not getting more buy support from the target audience.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: 100x profit are just a hype, that someone who told you about this project most probably are trap on this one.Well, This might not be a scam but try to analyze if that project really have a potential especially on surviving in a bear market. As I can see, you are just depending on the suggestion of your friend, take time to analyze on your own based on your own strategy, for me Its better to invest on top coins during bear market.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Never seek for that hyping project , remember that we are always in risk when we we are looking so much increase that  for that . look at that shared  project ? x100? i should not believe on that promises instead distance yourself.or maybe try to  invest but get out instantly once there is an increase happened.Quote from: Johnyz on July 16, 2022, 09:39:03 PM100x profit are just a hype, that someone who told you about this project most probably are trap on this one.Well, This might not be a scam but try to analyze if that project really have a potential especially on surviving in a bear market. As I can see, you are just depending on the suggestion of your friend, take time to analyze on your own based on your own strategy, for me Its better to invest on top coins during bear market.Yeah mate , thats it for what to look at.

comments.author: lixer
comments.body: Quote from: thegoatiest on July 16, 2022, 02:42:42 PMIt currently has a flexible APR loan rate of 25% at Kucoin. (pretty damn high for a flexible / not staking) Which makes me wonder - why do they want people to buy it? Someone told me it is 100x potential.... but... I don't trust them at all. They pretty much make exclusively bad calls...What're your thoughts on this project? Scam? or does it have potential?The coin's description looks like it was one of those serious coins but after reading the part where it offers high return, it then gives me a doubt. You ask if why do they want people to buy it? Of course for them to profit as well. If you are skeptical then that is a good sign that you must avoid this project. Only those who are allowed to invest on such are those who are willing to take big risks and can afford to lose money.This project was released on a bull run but I think that's how they work as I rarely see a project being released on a bear run but no, not all do that only because of the hype but there are legit projects to which stays even the hype was over.

comments.author: thegoatiest
comments.body: Yeah I'm not interested on this one. Thanks for sharing your thoughts on it.This person who recommends coins to buy - they almost always go wrong. (pretty sure he's always underwater lol and trying to pump his bags to dump on followers)

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Quote from: lixer on July 18, 2022, 08:35:48 PMQuote from: thegoatiest on July 16, 2022, 02:42:42 PMIt currently has a flexible APR loan rate of 25% at Kucoin. (pretty damn high for a flexible / not staking) Which makes me wonder - why do they want people to buy it? Someone told me it is 100x potential.... but... I don't trust them at all. They pretty much make exclusively bad calls...What're your thoughts on this project? Scam? or does it have potential?The coin's description looks like it was one of those serious coins but after reading the part where it offers high return, it then gives me a doubt. You ask if why do they want people to buy it? Of course for them to profit as well. If you are skeptical then that is a good sign that you must avoid this project. Only those who are allowed to invest on such are those who are willing to take big risks and can afford to lose money.Yeah, the part that it offers a high return is also a turned off for me.  It sounds something like a Ponzi multiplier or doubler where at the end, the system won't support the structure and always crumbles.  I tried to look for possible prediction of this project and I found this.From this price prediction, it looks like the expected high return won't happen soon.
